text: The spirit guard of Isha will not decay in battle.
Summons an exceptionally powerful unit: Ursun's Winter (Elemental Bear).
Effect intensity decreases with increased casting time.
Effect intensity resets to zero after all abilities are used.
This form grants the Necrosphinx ethereal state and swift flight.
In this form, the Necrosphinx cannot use its dual blades, reducing its melee capabilities.
Summons a unit of Sacred Titans.
In this form, the Necrosphinx can only remain grounded, reducing movement speed.
In this form, the Necrosphinx wields dual blades, enhancing melee capabilities.
Summons a unit of Bone Ostrich Riders.
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Transformation: Arkhan Black Tower Scorpion Titan[[/col]]
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Gains End Times Necromantic Avatar skill[[/col]]
[[col:green]][[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Gains King of Kings Avatar skill[[/col]]
Unlocks at Tier 1 Realm of Souls.
